phase-banner: Help us improve this service by taking part in research (opens in a new tab)

bank.details: This is a safe site. Your personal information is protected.

outside.start: How to claim is different if you claim from

northernIreland.summaryText: There's a different number for Northern Ireland

covid-19.p: During the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, phone lines are busier than usual and open shorter hours.

gb.option-1: Relay UK (opens in a new tab): dial 18001 then 0800 731 7898
gb.option-2: British Sign Language users can contact DWP using the video relay service on SignVideo (opens in a new tab).
gb.option-3: Check how to use the video relay service (opens in a new tab).
gb.opening-times: Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm (closed on public holidays)

ni.option-1: British or Irish Sign Language users can contact DfC using the video relay service on SignVideo (opens in a new tab).
ni.option-2: Check how to use the video relay service in BSL (opens in a new tab).
ni.option-3: Check how to use the video relay service in ISL (opens in a new tab).
ni.opening-times: Monday to Friday, 9am to 4pm (closed on public holidays)

gb.option-1: Relay UK (opens in a new tab): dial 18001 then 0800 731 7898
gb.option-2: British Sign Language users can contact DWP using the video relay service (opens in a new tab).
gb.option-3: Check how to use the video relay service in BSL (opens in a new tab).
gb.opening-times: Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm (closed on public holidays)

ni.option-1: British Sign Language users can contact DfC using the video relay service (opens in a new tab).
ni.option-2: Irish Sign Language users can contact DfC using the video relay service (opens in a new tab).
ni.option-3: Check how to use the video relay service in BSL (opens in a new tab).
ni.option-4: Check how to use the video relay service in ISL (opens in a new tab).
ni.opening-times: Monday to Friday, 9am to 4pm (closed on public holidays)

404.heading: Page not found
404.p1: If you entered a web address please check it was correct.

403.heading: Something’s gone wrong
403.p1: You can’t use this service just now. The problem will be fixed as soon as possible

500.heading: Something’s gone wrong
500.p1: You can’t use this service just now. The problem will be fixed as soon as possible

generic.heading: Something’s gone wrong
generic.p1: You can’t use this service just now. The problem will be fixed as soon as possible
generic.h2-1: If you need to claim your State Pension urgently
generic.p3: If you cannot wait to try again later, you can claim your State Pension by phone.

general.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
general.p2: We have not saved your answers. When the service is available, you will have to start again.
general.h2-1: If you need to claim your State Pension urgently
general.p3: If you cannot wait to try again later, you can claim your State Pension by phone.

canWeUseCookies.p1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
canWeUseCookies.p2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

acceptCookies.p: You’ve accepted analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

rejectCookies.p: You’ve rejected analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

noscript.p: We use cookies to make this service work and collect analytics information. To accept or reject cookies, turn on JavaScript in your browser settings or reload this page.

timeout.title: Your application will time out soon
timeout.message: You have been inactive for a while, so for security reasons your session will end in
timeout.message-suffix: If you do not continue your application, you will have to start your claim again.
